Qacwk, A kmvvwfdq usf'l kww kljsayzl. A
ymwkk A kzgmdv uml tsuc gf lzw usxxawfw.
fhqwhgadshgnsdhjsdbkhsdabkfabkveybvf
Gung'f n onq fvta.
Sqd'j meha byau jxyi.

Hey, I'm pretty swamped. Can you run an
errand for me?
What do you need?

The Bobs-Only Club placed a huge order for
B-shaped donuts, due tonight, but I can't
get anyone to confirm the order.
They haven't paid yet, either.

I went over there this morning, but they
wouldn't let me in! And Bob wouldn't tell
me anything!

I just want to know whether or not they
still want these donuts. I'm running out
of time to get everything ready by
tonight.

Can you find out for me? Get some answers
from Bob? Any Bob?

Sure, I can swing past that way. See what
I can find out.
Thanks.
Oh, and happy birthday.
Hear anything from the Bobs-Only Club yet?
Goin' back to work.
Name's Bob.
Stone Cold %Bob Austin%.
Right, what's yours, then?

You don't know who I am? We've both lived
here for years!

Don't know nobody. All I know is, gotta
keep everyone out.
You know, unless their name is Bob.
Bob?

Bob. Camel case.
Nice and plain.
Traditional.

'Cause this club is Bobs-only. You know,
the Bobs-Only Club.
Why is it Bobs only?

Why?
Why is it Bobs only?

Why, it wouldn't be the Bobs-Only Club if
I just let anyone in!

Well, the baker needs to know whether the
club still needs a bunch of B-shaped
donuts for tonight.

Do you know if the Bobs still want them?
There's gonna be a party tonight, right?
That's for Bobs to know.
Only Bobs.
Bobs only.
I think the baker needs to know, too!

Well, if his name was Bob, I would've let
him in!
So, what's your name then?

Um....
it's %PLAYER%.

Sorry, can't unlock the door for ya.
Bobs only.
Why, what luck! My name happens to be Bob!
Nice. Great name. I'll open it on up.
Head inside quick, now.

Oh, hello. You must be here for the annual
Bobs-Only Party, right?

Well, I hate to tell you this, but it's
canceled this year.
What? Canceled?
Yeah. This time, for real.

I mean, every year they SAY its canceled,
but this time it's actually genuinely
canceled.
Wait, canceled?!
But what about all the ladies?!

Ladies? I'm pretty sure Bob is a masculine
name, traditionally.
Nuh-uh!
What about Bob... rietta? Bob... velyn?
Barbara? I mean, Bob-ara?

They're still gonna come to the party,
aren't they?
Sorry, dude! Not if the party's canceled.
...Also not if none of them are named Bob.

Sure, they'll come! I just gotta wait a
little more!
I think you came to the wrong party.

Well, this place should be full of Bobs...
next year.

Bob-alina!
Bob-cine!
Bob-quelyn!
Come baaaack!

So I guess I can tell the baker to cancel
the donut order then, huh?
Guess so. Sorry about this.

They could've told me the party was
actually canceled before I made the trip
out here.

And it was a long trip, too. I came all
the way from the net!

*sigh*
Oh, well.

Wait. Weren't there two Bob golems last
year?
Why, hello there, fellow Bob!
Your name is Bob?
Why, it sure is!

You look an awful lot like Strong Bad to
me.

Wha-what? STRONG BAD? Never heard of him.
Though he sounds like quite the rugged
and handsome gentleman.

The name's Strong BOB! Just lookee here
at my fake -- I mean real -- ID!

(This ID clearly belongs to "Bob Newhart,"
but the word Newhart is crossed out.)

(I guess Bob out front doesn't have very
good eyes.)

Yessirree! Strong Bob's the name, and
partyin's the game!
Just a box of uninflated balloons.

How many balloons does a party need,
anyway?

We've been through all this before, you
know.

Doesn't matter. It's just the rules.
Bobs only.
Fine. I guess I'm not getting in, then.
Damn straight.
Well, my name is Bob! Happy?
Cool. Great name.

Canceled? The party at the Bobs-Only Club
was canceled? For real?
That's what Bob said.
Bob? Stone Cold Bob Austin?
Uh... well, it was someone named Bob.

Great. Just great. Just as I was putting
everything in the oven. Not gonna pay me
either, are they?

Well, thanks for finding out for me.
Now I need to find a way to move four
dozen B-shaped donuts.

Say, you wouldn't want a B-shaped donut,
would you? On the house.

Well that's no good. I should really try
to relax. Loosen up a bit....
Ahh, that feels nice.
Oh, hello, there.

I was just admiring the forest, with its
happy little trees....

I've made so many squirrel friends,
and....
Oh!

I didn't realize how late it was getting.
I think I might be late for work.

I'd better head out. Hope to see you
again.

Sorry, I can't serve anyone until the
party starts.

Help yourself to a Cactus Cooler, though.
Plenty in the fridge.

Wow. There's literally nothing but cans of
Cactus Cooler in here.
Wall of Bobs: famous Bobs.

Robert Parr, superhero.
Bob Kelso, physician.
SpongeBob, fry cook.
Sideshow Bob, entertainer.
There sure are a lot of Bobs in the world.
Mmmm, fresh bread!
How to Bob?
Bob Austin has been spoken to.

Bob Austin has been spoken to, and your
name is Bob.
Teleportation in progress.
